pymupdf.full_text:
mehdi baha 
20 Avenue Albert Einstein • 
Lyon, France • 69100 
(33) 6.65.59.90.15 
el-mehdi.baha@insa-lyon.fr 
International mobility 
LINKEDIN linkedin.com/in/mehdibaha 
GITHUB github.com/mehdibaha 
PROFILE 
I’m a passionate software engineer looking for an internship on Spring 2018. I want to bring my 
curious attitude, my love for programming and my teamwork spirit to an innovative company. 
EDUCATION 
2015-2018 
Fourth Year at INSA Lyon - Computer Science (MSc) 
Software Engineering, Algorithms & Data Structures, Object-Oriented 
Programming, Computer Networking, Mathematical Modelling, Networking 
2013 
Baccalaureate - Scientific Branch 
Graduate with Highest Honors. Ranked 1st in High School. 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
2016 (3½ m) 
Data Scientist Intern at AMADEUS - Nice, France 
- Developed an anomaly detection tool for accurate prediction of issues and 
outages in Amadeus applications, and root cause exploration of past incidents. 
Python, Data Analysis (Pandas), Full-stack (Python, Bootstrap) 
2015 (2 y) 
Digital Manager at FORUM ORGANISATION - Lyon, France 
- In charge of defining digital marketing strategy for leading french recruitment 
organisation (600k€ annual budget, 4500 candidates, 180 companies). 
- Designed, developed and deployed in less than 3 months an open-source 
digital recruitment platform (forumorg.org) 
Full cloud stack (MongoDB, Heroku, Python) 
2015 (6 m) 
Project Manager of BURND (5-person team) - Lyon, France 
- Developed a full-stack mobile application on Android (social network) 
- Front-end: Native client with a polished graphical interface (Material Design) 
- Back-end: Stateless RESTful API written in a minimalistic framework (Slim) 
Android, Java, PHP, MySQL, REST API 
2013 (3 y) 
Web developer at Aerospace club - Lyon, France 
- Migrated databases, and designed the new website club (http://cles-facil.fr) 
PHP, MySQL, Wordpress, Linux 
SKILLS 
Development Python (Data Science, Web), Java, C/C++, PHP, SQL, Android 
OS 
Linux, macOS, Windows 
Tools 
Git, AWS, Docker, Slack 
Languages 
French (Bilingual), English (Very good level), German (Two years of study) 
20 Avenue Albert Einstein • Lyon, France • 69100 • TEL (33) 6.65.59.90.15 • E-MAIL el-mehdi.baha@insa-lyon.fr

formatted.suggestion: Ensure your resume includes: phone, email, work experience with dates, education, and skills section.
formatted.example:
Contact: Name, Phone, Email, LinkedIn
Experience: Job Title, Company, Dates, 3-5 bullets

formatted.suggestion: Add clear section headers: Experience, Education, and Skills. This helps ATS identify and categorize your information.
formatted.example:
EXPERIENCE
Software Engineer, Company Name
• Bullet point 1
• Bullet point 2

formatted.suggestion: Use standard fonts (Arial, Calibri, Times New Roman). Avoid graphics, images, or unusual formatting.

recommendations: Moderate match. Focus on adding missing skills and keywords to improve your chances.
You have related skills that may help: Java (related to Related to spring). Consider highlighting the connection more explicitly.
Add these keywords naturally: ensure, technical, systems, detail, clean
